mapper.insert: insert into orders (user_id, number, status, address_book_id, order_time, checkout_time, pay_method, amount, remark, phone, consignee, pay_status, address, estimated_delivery_time, delivery_status, pack_amount, tableware_number, tableware_status) values (#{userId}, #{number}, #{status}, #{addressBookId}, #{orderTime}, #{checkoutTime}, #{payMethod}, #{amount}, #{remark}, #{phone}, #{consignee}, #{payStatus}, #{address}, #{estimatedDeliveryTime}, #{deliveryStatus}, #{packAmount}, #{tablewareNumber}, #{tablewareStatus})
